header.locationDescription: This location does not offer mail forwarding

overview.heading: Providence Virtual Office
overview.body: Experience the perks of a business address in Providence without the operational difficulties or financial responsibilities that come with a traditional office space. Opus VO provides you with the opportunity to establish your business in a high-profile Providence area, all for a fraction of the cost of a conventional office lease. Arrange business meetings, engage with clients, and conduct events in our state-of-the-art, fully equipped conference room. Boost your brand’s credibility with a prestigious address in one of Providence’s top business districts.  Opting for a virtual office in Providence via Opus VO offers you the unique privilege of a live receptionist, dedicated to delivering customized, high-caliber client service. Every client touchpoint is meticulously crafted to fit your specific business objectives, backed by our comprehensive suite of administrative services. These services range from digital mail sorting to state-of-the-art call-forwarding features and more. Our skilled administrative team will manage your routine tasks, allowing you the freedom to focus on strategic business initiatives and growth.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Providence, Rhode Island even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Providence. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Rhode Island.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Providence virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Choose a Providence Virtual Office?
sections.body: Providence is more than just the capital of Rhode Island; it’s a growing economic hub with diverse sectors like healthcare, education, and manufacturing. By situating your enterprise in this dynamic environment, you can tap into local opportunities that could substantially enhance your revenue streams. Conveniently located near essential business centers and key professional events, our Providence location ensures you have easy access to crucial industry leaders and invaluable networking opportunities.  By selecting an Opus Virtual Office in Providence, you’re not only lowering operational expenses; you’re also furnishing your business with a significant competitive advantage. Elevate your venture to new levels of success by taking advantage of our top-tier virtual office services today.  Opus VO, Providence @ 166 Valley Street Bldg. 6M Providence, RI 02909
